RelatedSentence: A pro-Israel group , who says it 's upset by anti-Israel ads that recently appeared on some metro buses , has countered with an ad of its own .
' The American Freedom Defense Initiative ' has paid to have Hitler 's face on 20 buses for the next month .

A0: The ad that angered ` The American Freedom Defense Initiative ' called for an end to aid Israel 's occupation .
